snippet.heading: There are two ways to connect an iPhone to a mini projector – or, for that matter, to a TV or computer monitor – wirelessly via AirPlay or using an adapter. To use AirPlay, it will also be necessary to have a compatible mini projector that is connected to the same WiFi network.22-Oct-2020
